title: Course for Detecting Misconceptions in Physics Mechanics and Strengthening Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Smartphone-based online learning environment for current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze discrepancies between performance (accuracy) and confidence when solving mechanics problems with over 90% accuracy
Learners can identify question types with misconceptions at 80% accuracy using Rasch model-based transformation methods
Learners can conceptually diagnose the causes of misconceptions through open-ended explanations and then develop correction strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
